product_name: Granite Gear Vapor Current Airbeam Frame
long_description: The Granite Gear Vapor Current Airbeam frame upgrades your Vapor Current pack to shave weight in the wilderness when every ounce counts-and it doubles as a sit pad or sleeping pad extension. Available in short, regular or long torso lengths, the Airbeam frame is compatible with Vapor Current packs, including the Leopard V.C. 46 and Crown V.C. 60 (sold separately). Lightweight and supportive design saves 3 oz. over stock frames and beefs up support to increase maximum load weight from 35 lbs. to 40 lbs. Use the Granite Gear Vapor Current Airbeam frame as a sit pad, or combine with a 3/4 length sleeping pad (sold separately) to create a luxurious, full-length sleeping surface.
short_description: The Granite Gear Vapor Current Airbeam frame upgrades your Vapor Current pack to shave weight in the wilderness when every ounce counts-and it doubles as a sit pad or sleeping pad extension.
